front.title: A RESTful Web Service for Domain Name Registration Data (RWS-DNRD)

abstract.t: This document specifies a RESTful Web Service for querying Domain Name Registration Data (WHOIS data). The purpose of this document is to facilitate discussion and serve as input into a standards process in this area, currently being discussed on the Worthwhile Extensible Internet Registry Data Service (WEIRDS) mailing list (https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/weirds).
